ygData.subject: Re: Help I look like a Nazi
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, I ve got a Wood elf male bard, and I wear the bronze helm because of how it looks.  I logged in one day and got a guildsay that said, Thunder cats, HO!!
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, I've got a Wood elf male bard, and I wear the bronze helm because of
how it looks. I logged in one day and got a guildsay that said, "Thunder
cats, HO!!"
Heheh, was lmao for a while :)


Taluvil
----- Original Message -----
From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 07, 1999 12:31 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Help I look like a Nazi


> From: Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...>
>
> At 10:08 AM 9/7/99 -0600, you wrote:
> >So...
> >Does anyone know if there is a helm comparable Banded that looks
different
> >on Humans, and where might I get one?
>
> Looks are soo important. I was wearing Banded, Loved the look, hated the
> helm. Of course, I hate anything that covers up my naturally boyish good
> looks ;) But in any case, when I upgraded to Bronze (I'm only 19th, BTW -
> Bronze isn't considered "twinkie" by this level, since so many people are
> buying and selling it) that was the UGLIEST helm I'd ever seen. I looked
> like the Rocketman :P Fortunately, I had saved my Banded helm, and so I
> went back to it - at least it was better than Bronze. I understand
> Rubicite follows the Bronze model, in which case, I may just dodge Rubi
> helms, too :P
>
> Talies the Orange-clad wanderer
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> ONElist: your connection to people who share your interests.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
